text: Bill Macy (born Wolf Martin Garber; May 18, 1922 - October 17, 2019) was an American actor and comedian. He was in many comedy shows during the 1980s. He was best known for his role as Walter in Maude. Macy was born on May 18, 1922 in Revere, Massachusetts.Bill Macy profile at FilmReference.com He was married to Samantha Harper from 1975 until his death. Macy died on October 17, 2019 in Los Angeles at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:Comedians from Massachusetts Category:American television personalities Category:American radio personalities Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: Bill Macy
